comment: Professor Akhter is amazing!! She is very kind and helpful. She will listen to your needs as a student and as a class and she will try and accommodate you. She is always willing to help out. Please take her if you get the chance. She gives lots of credit for effort and trying.
Great professor. Lectures were easy to follow and the homework was helpful for the test. Textbook was not mandatory and she provided plenty resources for studying and help.
her exams for this class are easy as long as you follow the notes religiously, and lab is very collaborative, so i really enjoyed this class
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class
